parts.text: {"word":"daylong","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"一日中の、一日かけての","english_definition":"lasting or continuing throughout the day.","examples":[{"sentence":"We had a daylong meeting to discuss the project.","translation":"そのプロジェクトについて話し合うために、一日中の会議を開いた。"},{"sentence":"The festival featured daylong entertainment and activities.","translation":"その祭りは一日中のエンターテイメントとアクティビティを特色とした。"},{"sentence":"They embarked on a daylong hike through the mountains.","translation":"彼らは山々を一日かけてハイキングした。"}],"collocations":["daylong meeting","daylong event","daylong celebration","daylong training","daylong journey"],"synonyms":["all-day","full-day","24-hour"],"antonyms":["short","brief","partial"]},{"part_of_speech":"adverb","definition":"一日中、一日かけて","english_definition":"throughout the day.","examples":[{"sentence":"The rain fell daylong, making it impossible to go outside.","translation":"雨が一日中降り続け、外に出ることが不可能になった。"},{"sentence":"We worked daylong to finish the project on time.","translation":"私たちは時間通りにプロジェクトを終えるために一日中働いた。"}],"collocations":["rain daylong","work daylong","study daylong"],"synonyms":["all day","throughout the day","the whole day"],"antonyms":["briefly","for a short time"]}],"etymology":{"value":"「day」と「long」の組み合わせ。","priority":"★★★"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ˈdeɪlɔŋ/","syllables":"day-long"},"inflection":{"notes":"形容詞、または副詞として使用。変化形なし。"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**daylong**」は、ある出来事や活動が一日中続くことを意味します。形容詞として名詞を修飾する場合と、副詞として動詞を修飾する場合があります。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ We had a day long meeting.","correct":"✓ We had a daylong meeting.","note":"「daylong」は複合語であり、スペースを入れずに一語で書きます。"},{"incorrect":"✗ The meeting was day-long.","correct":"✓ The meeting was daylong.","note":"ハイフンは通常不要ですが、文脈によっては使用されることがあります。一般的にはハイフンなしで使用されます。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":[],"phrasal_verbs":[],"related_adjectives":["long"],"related_nouns":["day"]},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B2","frequency_google_ngram":"比較的低頻度","priority":"★★☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B2","text":"「**daylong**」は、あるイベントや活動が一日中続くことを意味する単語です。例えば、「a daylong conference（一日中の会議）」のように使われます。日常会話よりも、ビジネスや学術的な文脈で使われることが多いです。","example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The company organized a **daylong** workshop for its employees.","translation":"会社は従業員のために一日中のワークショップを開催した。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"一日中の"},{"sentence":"The storm raged **daylong**, causing widespread damage.","translation":"嵐は一日中荒れ狂い、広範囲にわたる被害をもたらした。","type":"adverb","meaning_category":"一日中"}]}
